data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of La Guajira, Colombia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Guajira, Colombia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of La Guajira to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of La Guajira who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of La Guajira, Colombia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of La Guajira unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of La Guajira to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of La Guajira.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: La Guajira
location.cities_list: Maicao, Riohacha, Fonseca, San Juan del Cesar, Villanueva
location.cities_list_w_pop: Maicao (130,348), Riohacha (92,431), Fonseca (35,754), San Juan del Cesar (26,848), Villanueva (18,699)
